Guidance on best integration practices is provided on our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://documentation.bloomreach.com/content/docs/storefront-integrations\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Storefront Integration pages\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bloomreach Content SaaS combines features from our well-known, enterprise-level \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://xmdocumentation.bloomreach.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bloomreach Experience Manager (brXM) product \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(PaaS product), with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"modern innovations for SaaS-based content management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", in an updated UI that will still feel familiar to existing customers.
